Structs/TapGesture.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Tap.name: action

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV4font.name: font(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV4font.abstract: set the font of the receiver’s text.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV4font.name: font(name:style:size:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV4font.abstract: Set the font of the receiver’s text.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV4font.name: font(name:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV4font.abstract: change the font name of the receiver’s text

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV4font.name: font(size:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV4font.abstract: change the font size of the receiver’s text

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV4font.name: font(style:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV4font.abstract: change the font style of the receiver’s text

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV9text.name: textAlign(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV9text.abstract: set the textAlign of the back UILabel object.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV16tex.name: textShadowOffset(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV16tex.abstract: set the shadow offset, in points, for the text

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV15tex.name: textShadowColor(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV15tex.abstract: set the shadow color for the text

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV15tex.name: textShadowColor(red:green:blue:alpha:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV15tex.abstract: set the shadow color for the text, the color is generated by the rgba value.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV15tex.name: textShadowColor(hex:alpha:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV15tex.abstract: set the shadow color for the text, the color is generated by the rgba value.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV9brea.name: breakMode(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV9brea.abstract: The technique for wrapping and truncating the label’s text. Call lineBreakMode of the UILabel directly.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV010at.name: attributedText(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV010at.abstract: set the styled text that the label displays.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV011hi.name: highlightedTextColor(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV011hi.abstract: set the highlight color for the text.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV13isH.name: isHighlighted(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV13isH.abstract: set a Boolean value that determines whether the label draws its text with a highlight.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV22use.name: userInteractionEnabled(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV22use.abstract: Set A Boolean value that determines whether the system ignores and removes user events for this label from the event queue.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV9isEn.name: isEnabled(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV9isEn.abstract: set a Boolean value that determines whether the back label draws its text in an enabled state.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV9line.name: lineLimit(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV9line.abstract: Set the maximum number of lines for rendering text. 0 representing unlimited.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV11lin.name: lineSpacing(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV11lin.abstract: The distance in points between the bottom of one line fragment and the top of the next.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV25adj.name: adjustsFontSizeToFitWidth(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV25adj.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the label reduces the text’s font size to fit the title string into the label’s bounding rectangle.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV18bas.name: baselineAdjustment(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV18bas.abstract: An option that controls whether the text’s baseline remains fixed when text needs to shrink to fit in the label.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV18min.name: minimumScaleFactor(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV18min.abstract: The minimum scale factor for the label’s text.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV36all.name: allowsDefaultTighteningForTruncation(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV36all.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the label tightens text before truncating.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV17lin.name: lineBreakStrategy(_:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV17lin.abstract: A Boolean value that determines whether the label tightens text before truncating.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV8text.name: textRect(forBounds:limitedToNumberOfLines:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV8text.abstract: Returns the drawing rectangle for the label’s text. call textRect of the back label object directly.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV04dra.name: drawText(in:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV04dra.abstract: Draws the label’s text, or its shadow, in the specified rectangle.

Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV23pre.name: preferredMaxLayoutWidth(in:)
Structs/Text.html#/s:7ArgoKit4TextV23pre.abstract: The preferred maximum width, in points, for a multiline label.

Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.name: init(onSegmentedChange:_:)
Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.abstract: Initializes the segmented control with the given items. Items may be NSStrings, UIImages, or (as of iOS 14.0) UIActions. When constructing from a UIAction segments will prefer images over titles when both are provided. The segmented control is automatically sized to fit content.

Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.name: insertSegment(action:at:animated:)
Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.abstract: Insert a segment with the given action at the given index. Segments will prefer images over titles when both are provided. When the segment is selected UIAction.actionHandler is called. If a segment already exists with the action’s identifier that segment will either be updated (if the index is the same) or it will be removed (if different).

Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.name: setAction(_:forSegmentAt:)
Structs/SegmenteControl.html#/s:7ArgoKit.abstract: Reconfigures the given segment with this action. Segments will prefer images over titles when both are provided. When the segment is selected UIAction.actionHandler is called. UIAction.identifier must either match the action of the existing segment at this index, or be unique within all actions associated with the segmented control, or this method will assert.

Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.name: init(_:)
Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.abstract: init the ProgressView use the progress object to use for updating the progress view.

Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.name: init(progressViewStyle:)
Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.abstract: init the ProgressView use the current graphical style of the receiver.

Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.name: progressViewStyle(_:)
Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.abstract: Set current graphical style of the receiver.

Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.name: progress(_:)
Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.abstract: Set current progress shown by the receiver.

Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.name: progressTintColor(_:)
Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.abstract: Set the color shown for the portion of the progress bar that is filled.

Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.name: trackTintColor(_:)
Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.abstract: Set color shown for the portion of the progress bar that is not filled.

Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.name: progressImage(_:)
Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.abstract: Set An image to use for the portion of the progress bar that is filled.

Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.name: trackImage(_:)
Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.abstract: Set An image to use for the portion of the track that is not filled.

Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.name: setProgress(_:animated:)
Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.abstract: Adjusts the current progress shown by the receiver, optionally animating the change.

Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.name: observedProgress(_:)
Structs/ProgressView.html#/s:7ArgoKit12P.abstract: The progress object to use for updating the progress view.

Structs/PickerView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Pic.name: reloadAllComponents(_:)
Structs/PickerView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Pic.abstract: reload all components of the picker view

Structs/PickerView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Pic.name: reloadComponent(_:inComponent:)
Structs/PickerView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Pic.abstract: Reloads a particular component of the picker view.

Structs/PickerView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Pic.name: selectRow(_:inComponent:animated:)
Structs/PickerView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Pic.abstract: A zero-indexed number identifying a component of the picker view.

Structs/PickerView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Pic.name: didSelectRow(_:)
Structs/PickerView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Pic.abstract: set the callback called when the row is selected

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: datePickerMode(_:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Set the mode of the date picker.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: locale(_:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Set the locale used by the date picker.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: calendar(_:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Set the calendar used for the date picker.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: timeZone(_:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Set time zone reflected in the date displayed by the date picker.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: date(_:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Set the date displayed by the date picker.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: minimumDate(_:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Set minimum date that a date picker can show.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: maximumDate(_:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Set maximum date that a date picker can show.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: countDownDuration(_:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Set value displayed by the date picker when the mode property is set to show a countdown time.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: minuteInterval(_:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Set the interval at which the date picker should display minutes.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: setDate(_:animated:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Sets the date to display in the date picker, with an option to animate the setting.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: preferredDatePickerStyle(_:)
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: Sets preferred style of the date picker.

Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.name: datePickerStyle()
Structs/DatePicker.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Dat.abstract: The current style of the date picker.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV13r.name: renderingMode(_:)
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV13r.abstract: Adjust the rendering mode of the image.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV011.name: highlightedImage(_:)
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV011.abstract: Sets the highlighted image displayed in the image view.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV28p.name: preferredSymbolConfiguration(_:)
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV28p.abstract: Sets the configuration values to use when rendering the image.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV24i.name: isUserInteractionEnabled(_:)
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV24i.abstract: Sets a Boolean value that determines whether user events are ignored and removed from the event queue.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV13i.name: isHighlighted(_:)
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV13i.abstract: Sets a Boolean value that determines whether the image is highlighted.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV15a.name: animationImages(_:)
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV15a.abstract: Sets an array of UIImage objects to use for an animation.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV26h.name: highlightedAnimationImages(_:)
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV26h.abstract: Sets an array of UIImage objects to use for an animation when the view is highlighted.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV17a.name: animationDuration(_:)
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV17a.abstract: Sets the amount of time it takes to go through one cycle of the images.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV20a.name: animationRepeatCount(_:)
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV20a.abstract: Specifies the number of times to repeat the animation.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV9ti.name: tintColor(_:)
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV9ti.abstract: Sets a color used to tint template images in the view hierarchy.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV14s.name: startAnimating()
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV14s.abstract: Starts animating the images in the receiver.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV13s.name: stopAnimating()
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV13s.abstract: Stops animating the images in the receiver.

Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV9im.name: imageSize()
Structs/Image.html#/s:7ArgoKit5ImageV9im.abstract: Get the size of the image displayed in the image view.

Structs/Button.html#/s:7ArgoKit6ButtonV1.name: backgroundImage(image:for:)
Structs/Button.html#/s:7ArgoKit6ButtonV1.abstract: Sets the background image to use for the specified button state.

Structs/Button.html#/s:7ArgoKit6ButtonV1.name: backgroundImage(named:for:)
Structs/Button.html#/s:7ArgoKit6ButtonV1.abstract: Sets the background image to use for the specified button state.

Structs/ActivityIndicatorView.html#/s:7A.name: style(_:)
Structs/ActivityIndicatorView.html#/s:7A.abstract: Sets the basic appearance of the activity indicator.

Structs/ActivityIndicatorView.html#/s:7A.name: hidesWhenStopped(_:)
Structs/ActivityIndicatorView.html#/s:7A.abstract: Sets a Boolean value that controls whether the receiver is hidden when the animation is stopped.

Structs/ActivityIndicatorView.html#/s:7A.name: color(_:)
Structs/ActivityIndicatorView.html#/s:7A.abstract: Sets the color of the activity indicator.

Structs/ActivityIndicatorView.html#/s:7A.name: startAnimating()
Structs/ActivityIndicatorView.html#/s:7A.abstract: Starts the animation of the progress indicator.

Structs/ActivityIndicatorView.html#/s:7A.name: stopAnimating()
Structs/ActivityIndicatorView.html#/s:7A.abstract: Stops the animation of the progress indicator.

Structs/ForEach.html.name: ForEach
Structs/ForEach.html.abstract: A structure that computes views on demand from an underlying collection of of data.

Structs/Spacer.html.name: Spacer
Structs/Spacer.html.abstract: Representing of space within a container along the main axis.

Structs/Text.html.name: Text
Structs/Text.html.abstract: The View Representing of text，is implemented based on UILabel.

Structs/HostView.html.name: HostView
Structs/HostView.html.abstract: A ArgoKit view that manages a ArgoKit view hierarchy.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewP4bo.name: body
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewP4bo.abstract: The content and behavior of the view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: addAnimation(animation:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Add the specified animation object to this view

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: addAnimation(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Add the specified animation object to the view

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: updateAnimation(serial:progress:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Updates the animation in the receiver.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: startAnimation(serial:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Starts the animation in the receiver.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: pauseAnimation()
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Pauses the animation in the receiver.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: resumeAnimation()
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Resumes the animation in the receiver.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: stopAnimation()
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Stops the animation in the receiver.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: ViewNode()
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Undocumented

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: alias(variable:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Undocumented

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: alias(variable:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Assigns the view to the specified variable or property.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: addSubViews(builder:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Adds sub views to this view hierarchy.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: endEditing(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Causes the view (or one of its embedded text fields) to resign the first responder status.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: parentNode()
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Gets the parent node of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: applyLayout()
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Perform a layout calculation and update the frames of the views in the hierarchy with the results. If the origin is not preserved, the root view’s layout results will applied from {0,0}.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: applyLayout(size:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Perform a layout calculation and update the frames of the views in the hierarchy with the results. Pass NaN for an unconstrained dimension.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: calculateLayout(size:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Perform a layout calculation but do not update the frames of the views in the hierarchy with the results. Pass NaN for an unconstrained dimension.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: flexDirection(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Flex direction controls the direction in which children of a node are laid out. This is also referred to as the main axis. The main axis is the direction in which children are laid out. The cross axis the the axis perpendicular to the main axis, or the axis which wrapping lines are laid out in.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: justifyContent(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Ustify content describes how to align children within the main axis of their container. For example, you can use this property to center a child horizontally within a container with flex direction set to row or vertically within a container with flex direction set to column.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: alignContent(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Align content defines the distribution of lines along the cross-axis. This only has effect when items are wrapped to multiple lines using flex wrap.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: alignItems(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Align items describes how to align children along the cross axis of their container. Align items is very similar to justify content but instead of applying to the main axis, align items applies to the cross axis.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: alignSelf(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Align self has the same options and effect as align items but instead of affecting the children within a container, you can apply this property to a single child to change its alignment within its parent. align self overrides any option set by the parent with align items.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: positionType(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: The position type of this view defines how it is positioned within its parent.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: wrap(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: The flex wrap property is set on containers and controls what happens when children overflow the size of the container along the main axis. By default children are forced into a single line (which can shrink elements).

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: displayFlex()
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Undocumented

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: displayNone()
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Undocumented

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: flex(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets how a flex item will grow or shrink to fit the space available in its flex container.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: grow(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the flex grow factor of a flex item’s main size.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: shrink(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the flex shrink factor of a flex item. If the size of all flex items is larger than the flex container, items shrink to fit according to flex-shrink.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: basis(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the initial main size of a flex item.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: position(top:right:bottom:left:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets how this view is positioned in a view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: position(edge:value:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets how this view is positioned in a view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: margin(top:right:bottom:left:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the margin area on all four sides of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: margin(edge:value:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the margin area on specified side of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: padding(top:right:bottom:left:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the padding area on all four sides of this view at once.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: padding(edge:value:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the padding area on specified side of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: size(width:height:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the size of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: width(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the width of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: height(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the height of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: minWidth(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the minimum width of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: minHeight(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the minimum height of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: maxWidth(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the maximal width of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: maxHeight(_:)
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Sets the maximal height of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: width()
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Gets the width of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: height()
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Gets the height of this view.

Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.name: minWidth()
Protocols/View.html#/s:7ArgoKit4ViewPAAE.abstract: Gets the minimum width of this view.

Protocols/View.html.name: View
Protocols/View.html.abstract: A type that represents part of your app’s user interface and provides modifiers that you use to configure views.

Protocols/Gesture.html.name: Gesture
Protocols/Gesture.html.abstract: The base protocol for concrete gesture recognizers.

Enums/ArgoWrapType.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A8Wr.name: noWrap
Enums/ArgoWrapType.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A8Wr.abstract: The flex items are laid out in a single line which may cause the flex container to overflow. The cross-start is either equivalent to start or before depending on the flex-direction value. This is the default value.

Enums/ArgoWrapType.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A8Wr.name: wrap
Enums/ArgoWrapType.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A8Wr.abstract: The flex items break into multiple lines. The cross-start is either equivalent to start or before depending flex-direction value and the cross-end is the opposite of the specified cross-start.

Enums/ArgoWrapType.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A8Wr.name: wrapReverse
Enums/ArgoWrapType.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A8Wr.abstract: Behaves the same as wrap but cross-start and cross-end are permuted.

Enums/ArgoPositionType.html#/s:7ArgoKit0.name: relative
Enums/ArgoPositionType.html#/s:7ArgoKit0.abstract: By default a view is positioned relatively. This means a view is positioned according to the normal flow of the layout, and then offset relative to that position based on the values of top, right, bottom, and left. The offset does not affect the position of any sibling or parent elements.

Enums/ArgoPositionType.html#/s:7ArgoKit0.name: absolute
Enums/ArgoPositionType.html#/s:7ArgoKit0.abstract: When positioned absolutely a view doesn’t take part in the normal layout flow. It is instead laid out independent of its siblings. The position is determined based on the top, right, bottom, and left values.

Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.name: start
Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.abstract: Align wrapped lines to the start of the container’s cross axis. default

Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.name: center
Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.abstract: Align wrapped lines in the center of the container’s cross axis.

Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.name: end
Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.abstract: Align wrapped lines to the end of the container’s cross axis.

Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.name: stretch
Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.abstract: Stretch wrapped lines to match the height of the container’s cross axis.

Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.name: baseline
Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.abstract: Evenly space wrapped lines across the container’s main axis, distributing remaining space along a common baseline.

Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.name: between
Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.abstract: Evenly space wrapped lines across the container’s main axis, distributing remaining space between the lines.

Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.name: around
Enums/ArgoAlign.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A5Align.abstract: Evenly space wrapped lines across the container’s main axis, distributing remaining space around the lines. Compared to space between using space around will result in space being distributed to the begining of the first lines and end of the last line.

Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.name: start
Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.abstract: Align children of a container to the start of the container’s main axis.

Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.name: center
Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.abstract: Align children of a container in the center of the container’s main axis.

Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.name: end
Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.abstract: Align children of a container to the end of the container’s main axis.

Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.name: between
Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.abstract: Evenly space of children across the container’s main axis, distributing remaining space between the children.

Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.name: around
Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.abstract: Evenly space of children across the container’s main axis, distributing remaining space around the children. Compared to space between using space around will result in space being distributed to the beginning of the first child and end of the last child.

Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.name: evenly
Enums/ArgoJustify.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A7Jus.abstract: Evenly distributed within the alignment container along the main axis. The spacing between each pair of adjacent items, the main-start edge and the first item, and the main-end edge and the last item, are all exactly the same.

Enums/ArgoFlexDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit.name: column
Enums/ArgoFlexDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit.abstract: Align children from top to bottom. If wrapping is enabled then the next line will start to the left first item on the top of the container.

Enums/ArgoFlexDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit.name: columnReverse
Enums/ArgoFlexDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit.abstract: Align children from bottom to top. If wrapping is enabled then the next line will start to the left first item on the bottom of the container.

Enums/ArgoFlexDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit.name: row
Enums/ArgoFlexDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit.abstract: Align children from left to right. If wrapping is enabled then the next line will start under the first item on the left of the container.

Enums/ArgoFlexDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit.name: rowReverse
Enums/ArgoFlexDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit.abstract: Align children from right to left. If wrapping is enabled then the next line will start under the first item on the right of the container.

Enums/ArgoDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A9D.name: LTR
Enums/ArgoDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A9D.abstract: Text and children and laid out from left to right. Margin and padding applied the start of a view are applied on the left side.

Enums/ArgoDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A9D.name: RTL
Enums/ArgoDirection.html#/s:7ArgoKit0A9D.abstract: Text and children and laid out from right to left. Margin and padding applied the start of a view are applied on the right side.

Enums/ArgoDirection.html.name: ArgoDirection
Enums/ArgoDirection.html.abstract: Layout direction specifies the direction in which children and text in a hierarchy should be laid out. Layout direction also effects what edge start and end refer to. By default Yoga lays out with LTR layout direction. In this mode start refers to left and end refers to right. When localizing your apps for markets with RTL languages you should customize this by either by passing a direction to the CalculateLayout call or by setting the direction on the root node.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: init(text:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Create a new TextView with specified text string.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: init(textContainer:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Create a new TextView with specified text container.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: text(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The text that the text view displays.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: font(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The font of the text

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: font(name:style:size:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Set the font of the text, the font is created by the specified name and style.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: font(name:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Change the font name of the text.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: font(size:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Change the font size of the text.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: font(style:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Change the font style of the text.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: textColor(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The color of the text.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: textColor(red:green:blue:alpha:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Change the color the text, the color is created by the rgba value.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: textColor(hex:alpha:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Change the color of the text, the color is created by the hex and alpha.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: textAlign(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The technique for aligning the text. See:UITextView.textAlignment

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: selectedRange(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The current selection range of the text view. See: UITextView.selectedRange

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: isEditable(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text view is editable.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: isSelectable(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text view is selectable.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: dataDetectorTypes(detectorType:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The types of data that convert to tappable URLs in the text view.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: allowsEditingTextAttributes(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text view allows the user to edit style information.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: attributedText(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The styled text that the text view displays.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: typingAttributes(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The attributes to apply to new text that the user enters.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: scrollRangeToVisible(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Scrolls the text view until the text in the specified range is visible.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: inputView(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The custom input view to display when the text view becomes the first responder.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: inputAccessoryView(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The custom accessory view to display when the text view becomes the first responder.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: clearsOnInsertion(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether inserting text replaces the previous contents.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: textContainerInset(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The inset of the text container’s layout area within the text view’s content area.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: linkTextAttributes(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: The attributes to apply to links.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: usesStandardTextScaling(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: A Boolean value that determines the rendering scale of the text.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: shouldBeginEditing(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: set the callback of which return value determine whether to begin editing in the specified text view.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: shouldEndEditing(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Asks the callback whether to stop editing in the specified text view.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: didBeginEditing(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Tells the callback when editing begins in the specified text view.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: didEndEditing(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Tells the callback when editing stops for the specified text view, and the reason it stopped.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: shouldChangeText(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Asks the callback whether to change the text at the specified range.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: didChangeText(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Tells the callback the text at the specified range had been changed.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: didChangeSelection(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Tells the callback when the text selection changes in the specified text view.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: shouldInteractWithURL(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Asks the callback whether the specified text view allows user interaction with the specified URL in the specified range of text.

Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.name: shouldInteractWithTextAttachment(_:)
Classes/TextView.html#/s:7ArgoKit8TextVi.abstract: Asks the callback whether the specified text view allows user interaction with the provided text attachment in the specified range of text.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: contentInset(_:)

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: isPagingEnabled(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the isPagingEnabled of the UIScrollView behind the wrapper.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: scrollEnabled(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the isScrollEnabled of the UIScrollView behind the wrapper.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: showsVerticalScrollIndicator(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the showsVerticalScrollIndicator of the UIScrollView behind the wrapper.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the showsHorizontalScrollIndicator of the UIScrollView behind the wrapper.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: showsScrollIndicator(_:)

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the indexDisplayMode of the UIScrollView behind the wrapper.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Call the flashScrollIndicators of the UIScrollView behind the wrapper.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Call the delaysContentTouches of the UIScrollView behind the wrapper.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: canCancelContentTouches(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Call the canCancelContentTouches of the UIScrollView behind the wrapper.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: scrollsToTop(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the scrollsToTop of the UIScrollView behind the wrapper.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: keyboardDismissMode(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the keyboardDismissMode of the UIScrollView behind the wrapper.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: refreshControl(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the refreshControl of the UIScrollView behind the wrapper.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: didScroll(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the callback called when the user scrolls the content view within the receiver.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: didZoom(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the callback called when the scroll view’s zoom factor changed.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: willBeginDragging(_:)

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: willEndDragging(_:)

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: didEndDragging(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the callback called when dragging ended in the scroll view.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: willBeginDecelerating(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the callback called when the scroll view is starting to decelerate the scrolling movement.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: didEndDecelerating(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the calback called when the scroll view has ended decelerating the scrolling movement.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: didEndScrollingAnimation(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the callback called when a scrolling animation in the scroll view concludes.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: viewForZooming(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Undocumented

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: willBeginZooming(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the callback called when zooming of the content in the scroll view is about to commence.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: didEndZooming(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the callback called when zooming of the content in the scroll view completed.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: shouldScrollToTop(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the calback that returns the Boolean value.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: didScrollToTop(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the callback called when the scroll view scrolled to the top of the content.

Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.name: didChangeAdjustedContentInset(_:)
Classes/ScrollView.html#/s:7ArgoKit10Scr.abstract: Set the callback called when the scroll view’s inset values changed.

Classes/BlurEffectView.html#/s:7ArgoKit1.abstract: The node behind the visual effect view.

Classes/HStack.html.abstract: A view that arranges its children in a horizontal line.

Classes/VStack.html.name: VStack
Classes/VStack.html.abstract: The container that align children from top to bottom.
